mapper.insert: insert into reserve (id, reserveDate, bookNo) value (#{id}, curdate(), #{bookNo});
mapper.update: update bookstatus set reserveStatus=1 where bookNo=#{bookNo};
mapper.select: select re.bookNo, b.bookTitle, re.reserveDate, bst.returnDueDate, re.reserveFinDate, bst.rentStatus from reserve re inner join bookStatus bst on re.bookNo = bst.bookNo inner join book b on bst.bookCode = b.bookCode where re.id=#{id};
mapper.update: update bookstatus set reserveStatus=0 where bookNo=#{bookNo};
